subject: Golf
Television
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rosburg won the 1959 P.G.A. Championship but was probably best remembered as a longtime TV golf analyst for ABC Sports, gaining note as the first broadcaster to work entirely from the fairways.
snippet: Mr. Rosburg won the 1959 P.G.A. Championship but was probably best remembered as a longtime TV golf analyst for ABC Sports, gaining note as the first broadcaster to work entirely from the fairways.
